subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn, the defending overall and downhill champion, put down a blistering second run in a women’s World Cup slalom in Maribor, Slovenia, but it was not enough to catch Maria Riesch of Germany, who won her fourth straight slalom. Vonn had the fastest second leg by far but still finished tied for fourth, 2.04 seconds behind Riesch.
